passages.text:
Arthur's Puppet Theater presents: Goldilocks and the Three Bears, as directed by YOU.
  

[[weather-1]]

{
 "delay": 0,
 "vo": "gl-act1-intro-1.mp3",
 "role": "narrator"
}

passages.text:
Now, just as she fell fast asleep, the bears returned from their walk, ready to eat their dinner. But they instantly noticed that something was wrong.

passages.text:
The bears were surprised to find the intruder, and they started to...

[[caught-sad-1]]
[[caught-angry-1]]
[[caught-silly-1]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-3.mp3",
"role": "narrator",
"choiceType": "caught-response"
}
passages.name: caught-3

passages.text:
Cry!

[[caught-sad-2]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-sad-1.mp3",
"role": "narrator"
}
passages.name: caught-sad-1

passages.text:
Growl!

[[caught-angry-2]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-angry-1.mp3",
"role": "narrator"
}
passages.name: caught-angry-1

passages.text:
Laugh!

[[caught-silly-2]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-silly-1.mp3",
"role": "narrator"
}
passages.name: caught-silly-1

passages.text:
Last week the Big Bad Wolf tried to blow our house down – and now THIS!

[[caught-sad-3]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-sad-2.mp3",
"role": "parent-bear"
}
passages.name: caught-sad-2

passages.text:
Grrrr... You ate our food and slept in our house.

[[caught-angry-3]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-angry-2.mp3",
"role": "parent-bear"
}
passages.name: caught-angry-2

passages.text:
Joke's on her. There's a whole gingerbread house right next door she could have eaten.

[[caught-silly-3]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act3-caught-silly-2.mp3",
"role": "parent-bear"
}
passages.name: caught-silly-2

passages.text:
And she’s eaten all my food! That was my favorite meal ever!

[[caught-4]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo":"gl-act3-caught-sad-3.mp3",
"role": "baby-bear"
}
passages.name: caught-sad-3

passages.text:
And now I have nowhere to sit – because you broke it to pieces.

[[caught-4]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo":"gl-act3-caught-angry-3.mp3",
"role": "baby-bear"
}
passages.name: caught-angry-3

passages.text:
Oh, yeah. That place is delicious!

[[caught-4]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo":"gl-act3-caught-silly-3.mp3",
"role": "baby-bear"
}
passages.name: caught-silly-3
caught-4
caught-5

passages.text:
And so she zipped out of the cottage as fast as she could, and the bears never saw her again! 

[[caught-8]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo":"gl-act3-caught-7.mp3",
"role": "narrator"
}
passages.name: caught-7
caught-2
parent-5

passages.text:
Now, she didn't know it, but this was the bears’ house.

[[garden-1]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act1-story-8.mp3",
"role": "narrator"
}
passages.name: story-8

passages.text:
...but there was no answer.

[[story-10]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": "gl-act1-story-9b.mp3",
"role": "narrator"
}
passages.name: story-9b

passages.text:
(if: $costume is 'Goldilocks')[So many choices. But choose I must. First, the big chair.]
(if: $costume is 'Goldi-rocks')[An outstanding number of choices. First, the big chair.]
(if: $costume is 'Goldi-fish')[This is quite the selection. First, the big chair.]

[[seat-5-chair]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": {
	"locks":"gl-act2-seat-3-chairs-locks.mp3",
	"rocks": "gl-act2-seat-3-chairs-rocks.mp3",
	"fish": "gl-act2-seat-3-chairs-fish.mp3"
	},
"role": "goldilocks",
"location":"act2-prop1"
}
passages.name: seat-3-chair

passages.text:
(if: $costume is 'Goldilocks')[Let the choosing begin. First the big beanbag.]
(if: $costume is 'Goldi-rocks')[Ho-ho! Beanbags. EPIC. First one.]
(if: $costume is 'Goldi-fish')[Beanbags? Fun! Let's see. How about this one?]

[[seat-5-beanbag]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": {
	"locks":"gl-act2-seat-3-beanbags-locks.mp3",
	"rocks": "gl-act2-seat-3-beanbags-rocks.mp3",

	},
"role": "goldilocks",
"location":"act2-prop1"
}
passages.name: seat-3-beanbag

passages.text:
(if: $costume is 'Goldilocks')[I shall test them all. First the big train seat.]
(if: $costume is 'Goldi-rocks')[Train seats, dude. Awesome! How about this big one?]
(if: $costume is 'Goldi-fish')[Hmm. I've heard of a SCHOOL of fish, but never a TRAIN of fish. Let's try this one.]

[[seat-5-train]]

{
"delay": 0,
"vo": {
	"locks":"gl-act2-seat-3-trains-locks.mp3",
	"rocks": "gl-act2-seat-3-trains-rocks.mp3",
	"fish": "gl-act2-seat-3-trains-fish.mp3"
	},
"role": "goldilocks",
"location":"act2-prop1"
}
passages.name: seat-3-train
